information.tooltip:
• These refer to our Tactical Asset Allocation views over the next 12 months. Tactical views can be regional within an asset class or across asset classes.
  • Overweight reflects our expectation that the relevant asset class will outperform other asset classes.
  • Neutral reflects our expectation that relevant asset class will perform broadly in line with other asset classes.
  • Underweight reflects our expectation that the relevant asset class will underperform other asset classes.
